div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 100px; height: 1px; padding-top: 123px; margin-left: 28px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
使用者輸入：
1. 債券到期時間
2. 計息方式

switch.text: 使用者輸入：1. 債券到期時間...

div.font:

2. 票面價格
